text: Microsoft Learn is a library of technical and training documentation and a strategic initiative from Microsoft Corporation for end users and developers by offering a variety of educational resources and training courses. Microsoft Learn was introduced in September 2018. In 2022, the Microsoft Docs, which had replaced MSDN and TechNet in 2016, moved to Microsoft Learn. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Microsoft Learn Blog Category:Microsoft Category:Microsoft websites
title: Microsoft Learn
